titleStmt.title: The necessarie, fit, and conuenient education of a yong gentlewoman written both in French and Italian, and translated into English by W. P. And now printed with the three languages togither in one volume, for the better instruction of such as are desirous to studie those tongues.
Institutione di una fanciulla nata nobilmente. Polyglot
titleStmt.author: Bruto, Giovanni Michele, ca. 1515-1594.
Phiston, William, attributed name.

titleStmt.title: The necessarie, fit, and conuenient education of a yong gentlewoman written both in French and Italian, and translated into English by W. P. And now printed with the three languages togither in one volume, for the better instruction of such as are desirous to studie those tongues.

notesStmt.note: Italian text, with a French translation, and an English translation by W.P., of: Giovanni Michele Bruto, La institutione di una fanciulla nata nobilmente.
Identified as STC 7499 on UMI microfilm reel 219.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at UMI microfilm reels 179 and 219 (Bodleian Library copy).
